post.body: exposure, period.
forget that. blog what needs to be blogged when it needs to be blogged. looking forward to a link
awesome thanks!
youre tellin me cleveland and cinci are ahead of cbus? i dont buy it. although, good for ohio!
12.5 hours and im callin it quits. heading home to work on some personal stuff (cough need to blog cough)
startup weekend KC was announced today: http://snurl.com/9k5tc with 2 other startup weekend announcements to come soon. AWESOME!
on the iPhone the search bar in contacts should remain at the top of the screen indefinitely
hangin out at the office answering dynamIt CMS support tickets
Retweeting @osize: Took the words out of my mouth. Why I will not follow you on twitter http://tinyurl.com/a8e4rh
My favorite tweet of the day --> Rt @soldierant: Arrests possible in Twitter Hacking? Police suspect up to 140 characters involved.
people in accounting and financial industries can make themselves valuable by becoming experts on IFRS vs GAAP in 2009. its the future!
2009 will be the year of JavaScript Ninjas. nuff said.
talking about ghost stories
on the phone with @selicker
off to a meeting with @whitman and @mdopkiss. we are all wearing ties. this is epic
finally got around to updating the @dynamIt portfolio with some newer projects: http://snurl.com/9jf9x
Rt @dynamIt: better late than never. new blog post - a few @dynamIt 2009 web predictions. some fun, some serious: http://tinyurl.com/6gwcqw
OH: god that site is so f'ing bad. i mean, cmon, web that sh*t up!
